news_header: Pope Francis is hospitalized with pneumonia, but is alert and responsive, receiving well wishes from leaders and the public.
news_original_title: Italian PM Meloni visits Pope Francis in hospital as he battles complex respiratory infection
news_text: Pope Francis remains hospitalized with pneumonia and a bronchial infection. Italian Premier Giorgia Meloni visited him, reporting he was alert and in good spirits. Despite his condition, he continues to work and receive well wishes from around the world.
